artist: Artist: Lauren Weinstein , et al.; Author: Assata Olugbala Shakur , et al.; Editor: Sabrina Jones; Publisher: World War 3 llustrated, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical reproduction of an illustration of two figural serpents coiled around a skyscraper; 64 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: World War 3 Illustrated #30: Bitchcraft
